profile.name: EL MEHDI ER.RAJI
profile.about:
I'm a passionate and results-driven Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in building robust, scalable web applications using modern technologies. My backend expertise lies in Java (Spring Boot), PHP (Laravel), and RESTful API development, while on the frontend, I craft dynamic interfaces using Angular, React, and Tailwind CSS.

Through real-world projects like Guidely (a ticket management system with real-time notifications and email queueing via RabbitMQ) and Hunterâ€™s League (a competition management platform handling 112M+ rows), I've gained deep experience in DevOps practices including CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins), Docker, SonarQube, and database management with PostgreSQL and MySQL.

As a certified full-stack developer trained at YouCode â€“ UM6P, I thrive in Agile and Scrum environments, contributing effectively to cross-functional teams. I'm also a freelance project manager, bridging client needs with technical solutions from ideation to deployment.

Letâ€™s build something impactful together.

experiences.title: Full Stack Laravel React Developer
experiences.description:
I'm currently working on an exciting project to build a CRM system for e-commerce businesses. This comprehensive platform will feature invoicing, payments, notifications, and a store builder. Utilizing Laravel for backend development and React for the frontend, I am integrating robust functionalities to streamline business operations.

Key aspects of my role include:

 - Invoicing & Payments: Developing seamless invoicing and payment processing features.
 - Notifications: Creating a dynamic notification system for real-time updates.
 - Store Builder: Building an intuitive store builder tool to empower businesses.
 - CI/CD Pipelines: Leveraging GitHub Actions for efficient CI/CD workflows.

This internship is providing me with hands-on experience in full stack development, CI/CD services, enhancing my skills in building scalable and efficient web applications.
I'm currently working on an exciting project to build a CRM system for e-commerce businesses. This comprehensive platform will feature invoicing, payments, notifications, and a store builder. Utilizing Laravel for backend development and React for the frontend, I am integrating robust functionalities to streamline business operations. Key aspects of my role include: - Invoicing & Payments: Developing seamless invoicing and payment processing features. - Notifications: Creating a dynamic notification system for real-time updates. - Store Builder: Building an intuitive store builder tool to empower businesses. - CI/CD Pipelines: Leveraging GitHub Actions for efficient CI/CD workflows. This internship is providing me with hands-on experience in full stack development, CI/CD services, enhancing my skills in building scalable and efficient web applications.
